name: Boom Boom Escape
description:
Within the 2022 version of the htk academy Game Jam we developed BOOM BOOM ESCAPE!

In our game you will find
Explosions!

Prison!

Stealth!

Kidnapping!

As a vicious lawless villain, you got locked up in prison, which is run by an unyielding director.
But what would a villain be without the urge to break free!
Nothing can stop you to be a threat to everything and everybody around you! Your goal is to break free by leaving these mortifying walls behind you with a spectacular BANG! The prison has a mighty laser cannon. Use your inmates to load this absolute unit and chaos shall lead the way to freedom. Sneak your way through the prison. But stay alert! If the guards get hold of you the director won’t be far… [Controls]

Keyboard & Mouse
W A S D = Movement
Space = Jump
E = Interact
Mouse = Camera

Gamepad (any)
Left Stick  = Movement
South Button = Jump
Left & Right Button = Interact
Right Stick = Camera
